data.event: Nazareth was founded in 1740 by Moravian immigrants from Germany.

event.title: 1735 a small group of the Moravian missionaries had begun

data.event: In 1735 a small group of the Moravian missionaries had begun work in the newly settled community of Savannah, Georgia.
Like the Quakers, the Brethren refused to take part in the war with the Spanish and, as a result, they were evicted from Georgia in 1739.
